title: Promo Tourism System
content: Promo Tourism System is a web platform designed to help you find the best deals for your next trip. Built as part of my university assignment, it showcases my skills in creating practical and user-friendly solutions for travel enthusiasts. The platform is developed using Angular 17 for the frontend, ExpressJS for the backend, and MongoDB for the database.

title: KLS Bali Estate
content: KLS Estate Bali is dedicated to crafting high-end, bespoke villas with timeless design and quality craftsmanship. Founded by a team of experienced architects, KLS offers luxury villas for sale, blending exceptional design with prime locations. As part of my freelance project, I developed 6 websites for KLS, including Landing KLS, Architecture KLS, Property KLS, Management KLS, Our Lands KLS, and KLS Cleaning, all built using React 18.

title: Online Printing System
content: This website, OPS-Core, is my final project assignment. Itâ€™s an e-commerce platform built with Angular and hosted on Firebase. The backend is powered by ExpressJS, deployed on AWS EC2, and connected to a MySQL database. It supports local payments, leveraging Midtrans for mock transactions and payment simulations as a prototype.

title: Angular Anisite
content: This website, initially built with Angular 13 and upgraded to Angular 14, was created for my personal development and final college project. It is hosted on Firebase and utilizes Firebase's real-time database.

title: zTyrant Corporation
content: This is my first website I'm deploying to the public. This website is run using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
